title: What is Total Body Enhancement? Red Light Therapy at Planet Fitness

steps.title: Red light therapy can help shorten the body's recovery time.
steps.content: Red light therapy can help shorten the body's recovery time. After giving your all in a workout, it's common to experience muscle soreness. Planet Fitness’ Total Body Enhancement machines use red light therapy (RLT) which can potentially stimulate the body's collagen production and blood circulation to help relieve muscle tension. [1] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source Paired with the machine’s vibration plate, this may reduce cell inflammation and help you to nail the following day's workout a little easier. [2] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source It's important to note that while Planet Fitness' Total Body Enhancement (TBE) machines are advertised as infrared saunas, they're not. Infrared saunas use 1000nm or higher infrared light for deep tissue and heat therapy benefits. TBE machines deliver red wavelengths between 620-700nm, a common RLT wavelength. [3] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source

steps.title: Red light therapy might help cells work more efficiently.
steps.content: Red light therapy might help cells work more efficiently. While scientists are still exploring whether red light therapy is effective or not, they believe that when your skin is exposed to wavelengths of red light between 600nm or higher, the light may boost energy to the center of the mitochondria (the cell's powerhouse). This is thought to help the cells work more efficiently to promote healing and skin rejuvenation. [4] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Red light is believed to travel further into your skin compared to other LED lights. [5] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source RTL differs from traditional skin devices, like lasers, because lasers can cause skin irritation. However, RTL is a non-invasive treatment that is less likely to cause trauma to the skin. Note : There isn’t enough evidence to suggest that RLT is an effective treatment option, though some studies indicate that it can help with conditions like acne, hair loss, and muscle soreness. [6] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source More research is needed to determine its efficacy and long-term effects.

steps.title: Continuous use of red light therapy has the potential to be effective.
steps.content: Continuous use of red light therapy has the potential to be effective. Research is still being conducted to determine whether or not red light therapy is effective. According to Harvard Health, red LED light is believed to play a role in skin recovery, while blue LED light may help treat acne. However, many of these studies have been performed on small control groups, and not large ones as of yet. [7] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Medical School Harvard Medical School's Educational Site for the Public Go to source

steps.title: Red light therapy may reduce inflammation that makes muscles sore.
steps.content: Red light therapy may reduce inflammation that makes muscles sore. Planet Fitness’ Total Body Enhancement machines are said to promote pain relief after a workout. Because they use RLT, the machines might help speed up cell respiration and increase adenosine triphosphate (ATP) to stimulate the body's ability to repair itself. [8] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source The machine's vibration technology might also help increase blood flow to your muscles which can reduce inflammation. [9] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Other potential Total Body Enhancement benefits include: [10] X Research source Increased energy before a workout Improvements in skin elasticity Reduction of wrinkles, stretch marks, and cellulite Targets muscle groups: legs, arms, abs, glutes Firms and tones the body Reduces stress

steps.title: Yes—when used as a short-term recovery aid and as directed.
steps.content: Yes—when used as a short-term recovery aid and as directed. Red light therapy is a non-toxic, non-invasive skin treatment with no major side effects. However, it’s important to wear eye protection and ensure your light level is not too harsh. For instance, daily use of RLT with 1,000 nm can cause thermal damage to your skin. [11] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Refer to the manufacturer's recommended use and light levels before using RLT. Don't use RLT if you're pregnant or breastfeeding, have a condition with photosensitivity, or are on medications that make you photosensitive. [12] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Medical School Harvard Medical School's Educational Site for the Public Go to source Red light therapy may cause hyperpigmentation and melasma for darker skin tones. However, studies are still exploring this side effect. [13] X Research source When in doubt, speak to a dermatologist about using red light therapy.

steps.title: Schedule a session at the front desk or self-service kiosk.
steps.content: Schedule a session at the front desk or self-service kiosk. Before you begin, visit Planet Fitness' front desk to make an appointment. Some locations have a self-service kiosk with the available time slots. Once it's time for your session, check in with the front desk so they can let you know which private room is assigned to you. [14] X Research source Using red light therapy before a workout can help prime and energize the body, whereas using it after a workout might improve the body's recovery time. [15] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source

steps.title: Quickly undress to your comfort level and step into the machine.
steps.content: Quickly undress to your comfort level and step into the machine. Enter your private room and lock the door behind you. Each room has a Total Body Enhancement machine, a chair for your belongings, paper towels, and sanitizer. Red light therapy is most effective when you expose as much skin as possible—you can strip out of all your clothes or leave your undergarments. All Planet Fitness requires is that you remove your shoes. [16] X Research source Your session will automatically be started within 1-2 minutes, so be sure to undress and get into the machine as quickly as possible. Before your session, cleanse your skin so there are no lotion, makeup, or similar products on your skin. Wearing sunglasses or similar eyewear is optional but encouraged. [17] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source

steps.title: Select one of the four vibration settings for a full-body passive workout.
steps.content: Select one of the four vibration settings for a full-body passive workout. The platform you stand on generates vibrations that stimulate your muscles to contract and relax involuntarily, which might aid in their recovery. Choose one of the four settings, which include Feel Great (low intensity), Toning (medium intensity), Cross-Training (high intensity), and Multi-Level (mixed intensity). [18] X Research source Vibration therapy can potentially help increase muscle strength, flexibility, bone health, enhance circulation, and reduce stress. [19] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source

steps.title: Maintain a slight bend in your knees and raise your arms.
steps.content: Maintain a slight bend in your knees and raise your arms. Once inside the machine, shut the sliding booth door and stand on the grey vibration mat. Your session will automatically start; however, you can adjust the vibration using the interior remote. Stand with a slight bend in your knees and raise both arms above your hand. Some booths have straps you can hang onto. [20] X Research source You can also adjust the volume for music and fans using a small control panel. The panel will also display the time elapsed during your session.

steps.title: Enjoy a 12-minute passive workout and wipe the machine down.
steps.content: Enjoy a 12-minute passive workout and wipe the machine down. Each session lasts 10 minutes and ends with a 2-minute cooldown. Afterward, step out of the machine and get dressed. Use the sanitary products in the room to wipe down the machine before leaving. [21] X Research source You may not notice results after one use. Planet Fitness recommends using TBE machines 2-3 times a week with a 24-hour gap between sessions over 90 days.

steps.title: How often should you use Total Body Enhancement?
steps.content: How often should you use Total Body Enhancement? Information about how often you should incorporate red light therapy varies. Planet Fitness recommends using the TBE machine 2-3 times a week with a 24-hour gap between uses. [22] X Research source However, others recommend daily use. A study by the American Association of Dermatology showed textural and color improvements in patients who used RLT three times a week for two weeks. [23] X Research source Speak to a Planet Fitness representative or your local dermatologist for recommendations.

steps.title: How long does it take to see the results?
steps.content: How long does it take to see the results? Unfortunately, results vary depending on the person and their goal. Some patients have seen results, such as reduced inflammation and energy boosts, after their first session. Meanwhile, other users can take up to 4 months or longer of continuous use to see results. [24] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source

steps.title: Can you use red light therapy at home?
steps.content: Can you use red light therapy at home? Yes! Nowadays, LED red light therapy comes in many different forms. You can purchase a mask , lamp , or wand . You may not see dramatic improvements, but it may help slowly improve skin quality by reducing acne, wrinkles, and more. [25] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Medical School Harvard Medical School's Educational Site for the Public Go to source

steps.title: How much does Total Body Enhancement cost?
steps.content: How much does Total Body Enhancement cost? Planet Fitness' Total Body Enhancement comes with the Black Card membership, which costs $24.99 per month. Total Body Enhancement is only available in certain locations. So, contact your local Planet Fitness to see if it's available. [26] X Research source
